contents.text: Thank you for calling enSilo, protecting your organization with a unified endpoint security platform that stops malware before and after infection.
For sales and product information, press 1.
For new customer inquiries and demos, press 1.
All of our sales representatives are currently assisting other customers. Please hold, and we will connect you shortly.

navigationGoals: Schedule a demo of the enSilo endpoint security platform for my organization
I’d like to schedule a demo of your endpoint security platform.
I want to schedule a new-customer demo of enSilo’s unified endpoint security platform and review its technical specs.
I’d like to set up a demo of your endpoint security platform.
I’d like to schedule a demo of your endpoint security solution and receive product details to evaluate it in our physics research lab.

contents.text: For existing quotes or order status, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our order management team.

navigationGoals: Check the status of my existing quote or order for enSilo solutions
I need to check the status of a quote I received for enSilo services.
I need to check the status of my existing order for endpoint security licenses.
I need an update on the status of a quote I requested.
I need an update on the status of my existing quote for a campus-wide security deployment.

contents.text: For technical support and customer service, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support specialist.

navigationGoals: Troubleshoot a technical issue with the enSilo endpoint agent on my devices
I’m having trouble installing the enSilo agent on my system and need troubleshooting help.
I’m troubleshooting a failed agent deployment on my endpoints and need technical assistance.
I’m having trouble installing the software and need help.
I’m experiencing an installation error with the endpoint agent on my workstation and need technical assistance.

contents.text: For account management and billing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold for our account management and billing team.

navigationGoals: Resolve a billing question and update payment details on my enSilo account
I want to update the billing information on my enSilo account.
I have questions about my latest endpoint protection subscription invoice and billing details.
I need assistance updating my billing information on my account.
I have a billing question regarding the recent invoice charges on my security platform subscription.
